speaker: Clinician
text: And, uh, about the sertraline, have you noticed any changes in your mood or, um, any side effects since you started?
label: medication effects inquiry

speaker: Patient
text: Well, I think my mood's been a bit better, but I'm not sure if it's the medication or just, you know, things settling down a bit at home. I did feel a bit nauseous the first few days, though.
label: medication effects report

speaker: Clinician
text: That's not uncommon when starting sertraline. The nausea usually subsides after a week or two. Are you taking it with food?
label: side effect counseling

speaker: Patient
text: Uh, sometimes. I try to, but mornings can be hectic with the kids. I just grab it when I remember.
label: adherence barrier explanation

speaker: Clinician
text: I understand. It might help to set a reminder on your phone, just to keep it consistent. And, um, about the cost, have you been able to fill the prescription without any issues?
label: adherence and cost inquiry

speaker: Patient
text: It's been a bit tight, honestly. I had to skip a refill last month because of some unexpected expenses.
label: medication affordability issue

speaker: Clinician
text: Okay, let's see if we can find a way to make it more affordable. There might be some assistance programs we can look into.
label: cost assistance offer
